name: Mega Kawaii Chibi Avatar Maker
description:
Kawaii Games.net presents Mega Kawaii Chibi Avatar Maker, the updated Kawaii Chibi Avatar Maker that you already know, with a new design and more options.

In this game, you can create and dress up your own cute little anime version known as Chibi! You have tons of options to create your Chibi character however you want. Make a super cute chibi girl or boy.

You can save your creation with full body or avatar mode. It's perfect for creating your original characters or trying to create yourself as a Chibi persona!

And this game will be different from others. It will be constantly updated. It will be the new flagship of the site, so whenever possible I will update with new items related to festive seasons or inspired by anime series, for example. So always come back here to check out the new items.

Have fun! 💗
